thread.section_title: SMSGlobal Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of SMSGlobal | smsglobal.com
thread.title: DC

author: DC
title: DC
text:
If the dashboard showed the number of messages being charged for - including multiples for 160+ characters - rather than just the net number of messages. This lead us to query the charges as our money seemed to be disappearing faster than it should.
We are able to reconcile this at our end but perhaps a more informative approach would be to have both numbers visible.
Otherwise very happy with service.
